00015 require_once (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('gimmefive') . 'Classes/Component/F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager.php');
00016 
00023 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Logger_DB_testcase extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00024 
00025         protected $components;
00026         protected $logger;
00027 
00028         protected function setUp() {
00029                 $this->componentManager = F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::getInstance();
00030                 $this->logger = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Logger_DB");
00031         }
00032 
00033         protected function tearDown() {
00034                 unset($this->logger);
00035                 unset($this->componentManager);
00036         }
00037 
00038         public function test_log() {
00039                 $fakeGp = array();
00040                 $fakeGp['firstname'] = "Test";
00041                 $fakeGp['lastname'] = "Test";
00042                 $hash = hash("md5",serialize(array_keys($fakeGp)));
00043                 $this->logger->log($fakeGp,array("nodebug"=>true));
00044                 $currTime = time();
00045                 $threshold = $currTime - 2000;
00046                 $lastId = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_insert_id();
00047                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("*","tx_mailformplusplus_log","uid=".$lastId);
00048                 $this->assertNotNull($res,'Logged record can be selected again');
00049                 $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00050                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_DELETEquery("tx_mailformplusplus_log","uid=".$lastId);
00051                 $row['params'] = unserialize($row['params']);
00052                 $this->assertEquals($row['params'],array("firstname"=>"Test","lastname"=>"Test"));
00053                 $this->assertEquals($row['ip'],t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR'));
00054                 $this->assertEquals($row['key_hash'],$hash);
00055                 $this->assertGreaterThanOrEqual($threshold,(int)$row['crdate']);
00056                 $this->assertGreaterThanOrEqual($threshold,(int)$row['tstamp']);
00057                 $this->assertType("int",(int)$row['pid']);
00058                 $this->assertGreaterThanOrEqual((int)$row['pid'],0);
00059 
00060         }
00061 
00062 
00063 }
00064 ?>
